revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Moon |image = [[File:Digletts Cave.png]] |caption = A map of Mt. Moon. |tokens = 75 |location = East of Pewter City, between Route 3 and 4. }} '''Mt. Moon''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 834 |- | Kabuto (Boss) || 4,170 |- | Omanyte (Boss) || 4,170 |}
===Pokémon===
* Sandshrew * Clefairy * Zubat * Paras * Geodude * Pidgeotto * Kabuto (boss) * Omanyte (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 57% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 28% |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} [[Token Collector]] || 14% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
